page.title: 02RANSKILL SCHOOL
page.content: The school was opened on 9th Jan 1967 and is quite modern in its design.There are 6 classrooms a library a craft room and a resoures room.The first head teacher was Mr.E.E.Hammond and when he started there were 87 children on roll.Now there are 162 children,79 of which are boys,83 are girls.There are 6 teachers Mrs.Tompkins,who teaches reception infants,Mrs.Nicholls,who teaches middle infants,Miss Bumstead teaches top infants,Mrs.Jones teaches 1st and 2nd yr juinors,Mr.Lockwood teaches 2nd and 3rd yr juinors and Mr.Thorpe teaches 3rd and 4th yr juinors.Mr.Salt is the head master.School meals are cooked on the premises and the head cook is Mrs.Dickens.Approximatly 90 children have dinner,50 bring sandwiches and 22 go home.School starts at 9.15 & ends at 3.45.
